comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Misspelling, should be Ortiz. Miguel Serapio Ortiz, September 4, 1847 - June 23, 1925. He was a lawyer and Argentine politician. From February 16, 1914 to October 12, 1916 he was minister of the interior of Argentine. es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Usuario:Marcelo/Gobernadores_de_Salta www.portaldesalta.gov.ar/ortiz.html

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks so much for catching the typo B-59, and providing the additional information.  We'll make the change next time we update the record.
